name: Crate
description:
Hello here !

I welcome you to my first even FINISHED game !

The goal of said game is to reach the objective and use crates to your advantage.

Controls: A and D for horizontal movement. E to pickup/drop the crates. Space to jump. If Azerty is selected the controls will change into their respective counterparts. A little more text:

This was my first ever project using the gms2 engine, so feedback is appreciated !
